column4: During the boot in hoary, the part "Configuring network interfaces..." lasts about 2 min, what can I do to speed it up ?
if you don't have a connection, press ctrl-c to stop it and continue the boot process
type "apt-cache policy esound" in a terminal
yes, i just installed the new hoary yesterday
do the event sounds seem normal?
i have a nice sound at the beginning, but then, it's always the very quick sound that looks like a buggy sound
is this problem definitely fixed, or just for this session?
far from definitely fixed, i just knew killing esd would change something
when the sound isn't working right, type "ps -ef | grep esd" in a terminal
okay, i'll reboot and try that
